_header: In the beginning of this year
_description: A New Year Carol — one quatrain (aabb) and burden: ‘nay mary I nay maye mary / I peter but ye must / nay mary I’

BLRoyApp58.Transcription:
In þe begynnyng off thys four yerey herd A louer saye vntyll hys
                    fereSwet wordys off love ryght petuuslyAnd then sche sayde nay mary
                    INay mary I
BLRoyApp58.Editions:
Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts, Besonders aus der Zeit Heinrichs
                VIII.” 
             Anglia
         12 (1889): 225-72, 585-97: 265.
